CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Human Resources}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Absenteeism Rate in 1984?
VE.A: Human Resources's absenteeism rate in 1984 is {8.91} %.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Absenteeism Rate in 1969?
VE.A: Human Resources's absenteeism rate in 1969 is {5.83} %.

VE.Q: What is Management Team's Absenteeism Rate in 1979?
VE.A: Management Team's absenteeism rate in 1979 is {3.04} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Absenteeism Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total absenteeism rate is {7.92} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Absenteeism Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total absenteeism rate is {14.14} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Management Team's Absenteeism Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Management Team's absenteeism rate area is {4.02} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Human Resources's Absenteeism Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Human Resources's absenteeism rate area is {6.79} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate exceed 12 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {13.20} % in {1981}, total value was {14.14} % in {1986}, total value was {13.87} % in {1987}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate go below 10 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {9.12} % in {1965}, total value was {7.92} % in {1964}, total value was {8.78} % in {1969}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate fall between 10 and 11 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {11.05} % in {1978}, total value was {11.04} % in {1972}, total value was {10.94} % in {1971}.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1986, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1981 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between {1960} and {1986} was {lower} than between {1981} and {1986}.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1964 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in {1964} was {lower} than in {1985}.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1985, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between {1960} and {1985} was {larger} than between {1971} and {1983}.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1973, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between {1967} and {1973} was {smaller} than between {1963} and {1986}.
